response.overview: Originally released in 1973, Camel's debut album returns in this 2023 remastered edition featuring both a newly remastered stereo version and an immersive 5.1 surround sound mix. Created by Stephen W. Tayler from the original multitrack tapes, the mix highlights the band’s melodic phrasing, dynamic interplay, and atmospheric textures. A cornerstone of progressive rock, this edition offers a fresh listening experience while honoring the album’s original spirit.
response.title: Camel - Camel (2023 Remaster)
